description: Enmadou Rokuro is the boy who, together with http://anidb.net/ch78911 [Adashino Benio], was given the title of "Twin Star Exorcist". Rokuro was a gifted exorcist who, while still very young, helped purify Impurites alongside the adults. However, at this time the "Tragedy of Hiinatsuki" occured at his school in which Rokuro was the sole survivor. Ever since that incident he strongly refuses to become an exorcist.
name: Enmadou Rokuro
